resources.string: Make sure to whitelist Garmin Connect Mobile from any battery optimization.
Please install Sleep on your Garmin watch
Setup Garmin with Sleep as Android
Please install Watch/Phaser Starter for Sleep as Android to start tracking from the watch.
Sleep tracking with Garmin. Tap to stop.
Sleep tracking with Garmin using server. Tap to stop.
Please start tracking from the watch - Garmin Vívoactive 3 has a firmware bug that breaks starting from phone. Tap to see more information.
Unrestricted battery needed for this app on Android 12+. Tap on this notification, then on \"App battery usage\" and set to \"Unrestricted\".
